title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama, enabling programmatic chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node.js and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local Ollama models within LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI) supporting chat, model management, RAG, and plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama providing fluent APIs to generate, chat, and manage models from JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API, supporting chat and generation endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI client for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and inline chat into the editor.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama server for real-time streaming responses.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Example repository showing how to build a RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async chat and generation methods, available as NuGet package OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service inside a container for CI/CD pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support and model pre-loading.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama and its CUDA runtime for reproducible local deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go SDK for Ollama with streaming chat and generation support.
